screen.pathmind.visual_editor.title: Pathmind Visual Editor
screen.pathmind.visual_editor.subtitle: Create and manage node-based workflows
pathmind.title: Pathmind Node Editor
pathmind.settings.title: Settings
pathmind.popup.clearWorkspace.title: Clear workspace?
pathmind.popup.clearWorkspace.message: This will remove all nodes from the workspace.
pathmind.popup.importExport.title: Import / Export Workspace
pathmind.popup.createPreset.title: Create workspace preset
pathmind.popup.renamePreset.title: Rename workspace preset
pathmind.popup.deletePreset.title: Delete preset?
pathmind.node.type.startChain.desc: Activates a node tree by its START number
pathmind.node.type.eventFunction.desc: Runs a named function body when triggered
pathmind.node.type.eventCall.desc: Triggers the execution of a named function
pathmind.node.type.setVariable.desc: Assigns a parameter value to a variable at runtime
pathmind.node.type.changeVariable.desc: Adjusts a variable value up or down at runtime
pathmind.node.type.createList.desc: Create a list of nearby entities sorted by distance
pathmind.node.type.listItem.desc: Select an entry from a named list
pathmind.node.type.operatorEquals.desc: Checks if a variable equals a parameter value
pathmind.node.type.operatorNot.desc: Checks if a variable does not equal a parameter value
pathmind.node.type.operatorBooleanNot.de: Negates a boolean value or sensor
pathmind.node.type.operatorGreater.desc: Checks if a value is greater than a parameter value
pathmind.node.type.operatorLess.desc: Checks if a value is less than a parameter value
pathmind.node.type.operatorMod.desc: Returns the remainder after dividing one value by another
pathmind.node.type.operatorRandom.desc: Generates a random number between a minimum and maximum value
pathmind.node.type.goal.desc: Sets a goal at specified coordinates
pathmind.node.type.path.desc: Initiates pathfinding to the set goal
pathmind.node.type.invert.desc: Inverts the current goal and path
pathmind.node.type.explore.desc: Explores the world from origin coordinates
pathmind.node.type.controlRepeat.desc: Repeat enclosed nodes a set number of times
pathmind.node.type.controlRepeatUntil.de: Repeat until a condition becomes true
pathmind.node.type.controlIf.desc: Run the next branch only when a condition is true
pathmind.node.type.controlIfElse.desc: Run one of two branches depending on a condition
pathmind.node.type.swing.desc: Performs a hand swing and attacks if targeting an entity
pathmind.node.type.use.desc: Uses the selected hand with fine-grained control
pathmind.node.type.interact.desc: Interacts with the targeted block or entity
pathmind.node.type.placeHand.desc: Places a block from the selected hand
pathmind.node.type.trade.desc: Trades with a villager when merchant screen is open
pathmind.node.type.dropSlot.desc: Drops items from a specific slot
pathmind.node.type.writeBook.desc: Writes text to an open book and quill
pathmind.node.type.uiUtils.desc: Accesses UI-Utils actions like packet toggles and GUI control
pathmind.node.type.equipArmor.desc: Equips armor from an inventory slot
pathmind.node.type.equipHand.desc: Moves an inventory item into a hand
pathmind.node.type.sensorTouchingBlock.d: Detect if player is touching a specific block
Detect if player is touching an entity
pathmind.node.type.sensorAtCoordinates.d: Detect if player is at specific coordinates
pathmind.node.type.sensorPositionOf.desc: Gets the position of an entity, block, or item
pathmind.node.type.sensorTargetedBlock.d: Gets the block the player is targeting
pathmind.node.type.sensorLookDirection.d: Gets the direction the player is looking
pathmind.node.type.sensorTargetedBlockFa: Gets the face of the block the player is targeting
pathmind.node.type.sensorGuiFilled.desc: Detect if the open GUI has every slot filled
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsDaytime.desc: Detect if it is currently daytime
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsRaining.desc: Detect if it is raining or snowing
pathmind.node.type.sensorHealthBelow.des: Detect if player health is below a threshold
pathmind.node.type.sensorHungerBelow.des: Detect if player hunger is below a threshold
pathmind.node.type.sensorItemInInventory: Detect if the player has a specific item
pathmind.node.type.sensorItemInSlot.desc: Detect if a specific item is in a specific inventory slot
pathmind.node.type.sensorVillagerTrade.d: Detect if the open villager trade list contains the selected trade
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsSwimming.desc: Detect if the player is swimming
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsInLava.desc: Detect if the player is touching lava
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsUnderwater.de: Detect if the player is fully submerged
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsOnGround.desc: Detect if the player is touching the ground
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsFalling.desc: Detect if the player is currently falling
pathmind.node.type.sensorIsRendered.desc: Detect if a specified block, item, entity, or player is currently visible to the player
pathmind.node.type.sensorKeyPressed.desc: Detect if a specific keyboard key is currently held
pathmind.node.type.sensorChatMessage.des: Detect if a player sent a chat message within a time window
pathmind.node.type.sensorVariableIs.desc: Detect if a variable matches a value
pathmind.node.type.paramVillagerTrade.de: Selects a villager profession and trade item
pathmind.node.type.paramWaypoint.desc: Represents a waypoint name and optional range
pathmind.node.type.paramMessage.desc: Represents reusable chat or sign text
pathmind.node.type.paramRange.desc: Represents a generic radius or range
pathmind.node.type.paramDirection.desc: Represents a direction (north, south, east, west, up, down)
pathmind.node.type.paramRotation.desc: Represents yaw and pitch direction with optional distance
pathmind.node.type.paramPlaceTarget.desc: Represents a block placement with coordinates
pathmind.node.type.paramClosest.desc: Represents the nearest open block location
